Published November 13 2014

Magic

Magic — Automagically pull in bios, names, and tag-lines from a single email. Doesn’t look like it’s live yet, but appears to be something from Dustin Curtis, creator of blogging platform Svbtle. It has a demo page you can try out by typing in hi@dustincurtis.com(Curtis’ public email).

Enjoy your day.
